segments.text: I see the woman is wearing an apron, she must have been cooking or cleaning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just streaming down the cabinet doors, it's going to cause damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really focused on getting those cookies, he doesn't even notice the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being patient, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor, it's a slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly on the counter, at least someone has been keeping things tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in so much light, it's a bright and sunny day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the children taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost full, they must have baked recently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall off that stool, it looks so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR
